Package index

All functions

bootstrap_df()
Bootstrap an AFQ dataframe
build_formula()
Build a GAM formula dynamically
fit_gam()
Fit a GAM for tract node metrics (e.g. FA, MD)
parse_s3_uri()
Parse an S3 URI
plot_gam_splines()
Plot GAM splines for each group
plot_tract_profiles()
Plot tract profiles for each bundle as a facet and each metric as a figure.
read_afq_files()
Create a merged AFQ/phenotype dataframe
read_afq_hbn()
Load tract profiles from the Healthy Brain Network dataset
read_afq_sarica()
Load tract profiles from Sarica et al.
read_afq_weston_havens()
Load tract profiles from Yeatman et al.
sampling_test()
Perform repeated sampling tests on an AFQ dataframe.
select_bundle()
Select a single bundle from an AFQ dataframe
shuffle_df()
Shuffle an AFQ dataframe
spline_diff()
Calculate and plot difference between two splines
tract_name()
Retrieve tract name from abbreviation
tractable_single_bundle()
Analyze group differences in a single dMRI tract profile using GAMs
